itemDescription: English radio and television presenter and convicted criminal

wikipedia_page.main:
Peter Rowell (born 17 June 1958) is an English former radio and television presenter.
Rowell spent much of his career working in the West of England. In March 2012, he was jailed for six years after admitting 12 charges of indecent sexual assault against underage girls and further charges of making and possessing indecent images of children.

response: *Peter Rowell (jailed)Ex-BBC presenter Peter Rowell jailed for abusing girls

link_mentions.page: List of ITV journalists and newsreaders
response: * Peter Rowell – continuity announcer and daytime newsreader for HTV West from the late 1980s until he left in 2010 to join BBC Radio Bristol. He was jailed in 2012 on historical sexual assault charges.
Notable former on air staff include Lisa Aziz, Bob Crampton, Mark Longhurst, Peter Rowell and Steve Scott.
